string.text: I heard that I can exchange armors I found for some of our faction, right?

You heard right stalker. I will give you some armors that are about the same kind than the one you have in your posession. Remember that if your armor is in bad shape, I will not give you a prestine one eh? It's not Babushka's house here. You give me a random pile of crap, I will give you a scavenged, rusty and smelly armor some of our stalkers brought the other day. On the other hand, if your armor is in good shape, I will give you a shiny new outfit ok? By the way, this service is not free. You can check the prices on the bilboard over there. Consider the cost as a fee for the whole service to run since we repair some of the armors, and as a donation for our faction to prosper. So, which type of armor do you want to trade? I will check if you have an outfit matching what you seek.
